dt-option.name: searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.origData
dt-option.summary: The original data point that is used for filtering, not necessarily the column title.

type.description: The original column data point key used for this column. This value will be undefined if using dom sourced or array based data.

dt-option.description:
This value is only used when `-init serverSide` processing is enabled. This value is the original field name and is used within the server side integration to select the correct field.
For more information on preDefined searches please refer to the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined` option or the [manual page](//datatables.net/extensions/searchbuilder/predefined).

example.title: Defining a preDefined criteria for the Office column
